'''13w49a''' is the eighth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.4]], released on December 5, 2013.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|408607632124309504|Have a Minecraft snapshot 13w49a to fix the render distance bug (and other stuff)!|December 5, 2013}}</ref> This is the final snapshot released in 2013.

== Additions ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Chicken Jockey Revision 1.png|32px]] [[Chicken jockey]]s'''
* Consist of a baby zombie riding a chicken.
* The zombie controls the chicken instead of using the chicken AI.
* Because the zombie is riding a chicken, it cannot take fall damage.
* Extremely rare to find.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Mojang logo'''
* Changed from 512&times;512 to 256&times;256.

=== [[Music discs]] ===
* All music discs are now stored in an indexed hash, rather than stored directly in the <code>.minecraft</code> folder.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w49a|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|31622|Wrong render distance on 9 and more chunks settings.
|41165|SetSlot packet can no longer set item under cursor.
|41407|Minor optimization to world generation.
|41508|Hopper: <code>java.lang.IllegalStateException: Not a JSON Object</code>.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 13w49a was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
